column2: autolayer(meanf(y = co2, h = 120), series = "Historical Mean", PI = FALSE, showgap = TRUE) +
autolayer(rwf(y = co2, h = 120), series = "Random Walk Factor", PI = FALSE, showgap = FALSE) +
autolayer(rwf(y = co2,drift = TRUE, h = 120), series = "Seasonal naive", PI = FALSE, showgap = FALSE)+
